code:
# @param {String} s
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer}
def count_k_subsequences_with_max_beauty(s, k)
    return 0 if k <= 0 || s.empty?
    mod = 10**9 + 7
    freq = Hash.new(0)
    s.each_char { |c| freq[c] += 1 }
    max_beauty = freq.values.sort.reverse[0...k].sum
    freq = freq.values.select { |f| f >= max_beauty/k }.sort.reverse
    n = freq.length
    dp = Array.new(n+1) { Array.new(k+1, 0) }
    dp[0][0] = 1
    1.upto(n) do |i|
        0.upto(k) do |j|
            dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j]
            dp[i][j] += dp[i-1][j-1] if j > 0 && freq[i-1] >= j
            dp[i][j] %= mod
        end
    end
    dp[n][k]
end
